title: Olivia Confronts Max
text: OLIVIA confronts MAX about his infidelity. The tension builds until she demands to be let out of the car and walks off into the night.

title: Jai and Her Father
text: JAI packs food and chats with her DAD, who warns her about working at quiet places.

title: Jai Arrives at Work
text: JAI arrives at Benny’s Gas Station, clocks in, and chats briefly with MR. HUGO. A TV in the background discusses vampiric integration.

title: The Attack
text: A vampire attacks outside the gas station. V-HEAD #2 is fed on, the vampire disappears, and Jai is left in shock.

title: Sheriff Arrives
text: SHERIFF DARIUS arrives and finds no sign of struggle or victim, only wind.

title: Ebony Transforms
text: EBONY transitions from nurse to dancer, prepping her gear in the hospital parking lot.

title: Ebony Performs
location: INT. THE CUBICLE STRIP CLUB – NIGHT
text: EBONY takes the stage at The Cubicle. VALENTINE watches her from the crowd with intense interest.

title: VIP Encounter
text: EBONY and VALENTINE converse privately. He gives her $10,000 to simply talk, signaling deeper interest.

title: Frat House Party
text: ASHLEE guides SOPHIA through the crowded frat party. Sophia feels out of place.

title: Olivia’s Ride
text: OLIVIA gets into a mysterious Uber. The DRIVER gives her cryptic but kind advice.

title: Roommates
text: JAI and EBONY discuss their living arrangement. Tension and love coexist between them.

title: DMACC Learns About V
text: DMACC hears rumors about V, a vampire-related drug. He seems intrigued.

title: DMACC at The Cubicle
text: DMACC enters the strip club and surveys the scene. He is watching, learning.

title: DMACC Alone
text: DMACC reflects alone and receives a text about V. He seems ready to act.

title: Sophia’s Abduction
text: SOPHIA is abducted outside the frat house. The threat is real and present.

title: Ritual in the Woods
text: A ritual is performed by hooded figures. They denounce integration. A young member kneels before the fire.
